docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs ¶ For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands ¶ mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout ¶ mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files. Feature test ¶ Part A Part B Contents Camping tents E = mc^2 E = mc^2 is a thing int main ( int argc , char ** argv ) { return 0 ; } Warning I wish this would work
